Name: Hyper Box
About the game: Hyper Box - A real challange Hyper Box is a challanging platformer with simple mechanics that you can use in different ways to complete the games levels. The game contains unlockable skins and levels. A lot more will be added during the games current development. Can you beat Hyper Box? If you notice any launcher trouble during the first launch day, please notify me and it should be fixed within a couple days. If this happens it will probably be a minor problem with the Steam launch option, if so you can just manually start the game from the games folder until fixed.
